timelineData.text: He worked on the railway transport.
From 1941 - Served in the Red Army.
He taught folklore and Russian literature in Mogilev Pedagogical Institute. He worked in the regional newspaper «For the Motherland» (Mogilev).
Member of the Union of Writers of the USSR.
Director of the Belarusian branch of the All-Union Office for the Protection of Copyright of the USSR Writers Union.

work.title: Collection of tales «What do you think - so have you»
Collection of tales «On the fun wave»
Collection of tales «There and cancer with claws ...»
